ruleset.name: Apex Documentation Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex documentation standards

rule.name: ExceptionDocumentationRequired
rule.message: Methods that throw exceptions must document them with @throws tags in their ApexDoc comments
rule.description: Methods that contain throw statements must document the exceptions they throw using @throws tags in their ApexDoc comments. This rule checks methods that have ApexDoc comments but are missing the required @throws documentation for exceptions they throw. Proper exception documentation helps developers understand what exceptions a method can throw and when.
